name: Outta Space (Xenocode13)
description:
Outta Space is a simple game I made while trying to learn HTML5 game development w/ Pixi.js library. Expect a lot of bugs for now lol

You play as mankind's last hope against an alien invasion that threatens the entire existence of humanity.

Blow up legions of alien UFOs and survive alien invasion waves for as long as you can.

Credits for the sprites and audio used in the game go to their respective owners.

NOTE: When setting the game to fullscreen, click the [Tab] button to regain focus and make the keyboard controls work fine as usual.
